snippet: The first semifinal games in the new college football playoff system will be played in the Rose Bowl and the Sugar Bowl on Jan. 1, 2015.
abstract: First semifinal games in new college football playoff system will be played in Rose and Sugar bowls on Jan 1, 2015.
lead_paragraph: The first semifinal games in the new college football playoff system will be played in the Rose Bowl and the Sugar Bowl on Jan. 1, 2015.

headline.main: Rose and Sugar Will Be Semifinals
headline.print_headline: Rose and Sugar Will Be Semifinals
